page.title: 14ARTS AND CRAFTS (1)
page.content:
{ CREEL AND NET MAKING
Fishing and industries connected with fishing such as creel making and net making used to be very important in Hilton of Cadboll.It takes about four hours to make a creel.Most people still make their own creels.To make a creel you need cane,net and wood for the base.People have been taught to make creels because it is impossible to make them without training. The fishing industries were very important at the end of the nineteenth century but they are not so important now.Nearly all the men and women in the area used to work at the fishing industries when all the fish were sold.Now people keep them and deep-freeze them.Fishing is now more popular as a sport.
